title: fix: unify BYOP detection across KPI dashboard and Grafana
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Aligning the charts
gist.blurb: Unified how we track BYOP usage across our internal dashboards. Consistency is key when counting pollen.
gist.summary: Standardized BYOP detection logic across TinyBird pipes and Grafana dashboards to ensure consistent internal reporting.
gist.impact: Operational metrics now show consistent user segment data across all monitoring tools.
gist.visual_concept: The Monitor Robot and Polly the Bee synchronizing two different data charts. The robot is adjusting a line on a graph to match another graph held by the bee.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art of the robot mascot and the bee mascot comparing two pixelated charts that now look identical. Lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Warm lighting, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites. Pixel text 'SYNC'. Nostalgic office vibes.
